item.title: Firefox Language
item.description: install your language file from here about:config -> 'general.useragent.locale': 'de' restart Firefox http://ftp.mozilla.org/pub/firefox/nightly/latest-mozilla-central-l10n/linux-x86_64/xpi/ http://ftp.mozilla.org/pub/firefox/nightly/latest-mozilla-central-l10n
